0.name: Arrowslinger
0.fullDesc: Deals <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Yukong's ATK as Imaginary DMG to a target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to an enemy.

0.name: Emboldening Salvo
0.fullDesc: Obtains {{1}} stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" (to a maximum of 2 stacks). When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, the ATK of all allies increases by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>, and every time an ally's turn (including Yukong's) ends, Yukong loses 1 stack of "Roaring Bowstrings."\nWhen it's the turn where Yukong gains "Roaring Bowstrings" by using Skill, "Roaring Bowstrings" will not be removed.
0.shortDesc: Obtains 2 stacks of Roaring Bowstrings. All allies' <color=#f29e38ff>ATK increases</color> when Roaring Bowstrings is active on this character.

0.name: Diving Kestrel
0.fullDesc: If "Roaring Bowstrings" is active on Yukong when her Ultimate is used, additionally increases all allies' CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> and CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: When Roaring Bowstrings is active on this character, <color=#f29e38ff>increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG</color> of all allies and deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Chasing the Wind
0.fullDesc: After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for {{1}} seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by {{2}}%, and Yukong gains {{3}} stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.
0.shortDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Increases Movement Speed</color>. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, receive 2 stacks of Roaring Bowstrings.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
